metadata.title: CVE-2016-10325 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In libosip2 in GNU oSIP 4.1.0, a malformed SIP message can lead to a heapbuffer overflow in the _osip_message_to_str() function defined inosipparser2/osip_message_to_str.c, resulting in a remote DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10325` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libosip2-11 - 4.1.0-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libosip2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
